fullText: The musical version of Amélie, which opened Sunday at the Walter Kerr Theater, is so determined to be enchanting that it becomes exhausting instead.
dtliExcerpt: The musical version of Amélie, which opened Sunday at the Walter Kerr Theater, is so determined to be enchanting that it becomes exhausting instead.
